english name: Performing With All My Heart and Soul
skill name (japanese): プロとして進むみんなのために
skill name (english): For Everyone Who's Moving Forward to Become Professionals
skill effect (japanese): 5秒間 スコアが100%UPする 自身を除き「Leo/need」メンバーを1人編成する毎にスコアが10%UPし、全員一致で更に10%UPする（最大150%)
skill effect (english): 100% score boost for 5 seconds. Gain additional +10% boost for every [Leo/need] card (except for themselves), and another +10% boost if all card are from the same unit (up to 150%).
gacha phrase: みんなの背中を押せるように……！
